00010     SimParticle::ProcessTypeMap SimParticle::createProcessTypeMap() {
00011         ProcessTypeMap procMap;
00012         procMap["eBrem"] = ProcessType::eBrem; /* electron brem */
00013         procMap["conv"] = ProcessType::conv; /* gamma to e+e- */
00014         procMap["annihil"] = ProcessType::annihil; /* positron annihilation */
00015         procMap["compt"] = ProcessType::compt; /* compton scattering */
00016         procMap["phot"] = ProcessType::phot; /* photoelectric */
00017         procMap["eIoni"] = ProcessType::eIoni; /* electron ionization */
00018         procMap["msc"] = ProcessType::msc; /* multiple coulomb scattering */
00019         procMap["photonNuclear"] = ProcessType::photonNuclear; /* photonuclear */
00020         procMap["electronNuclear"] = ProcessType::electronNuclear; /* electronuclear*/
00021         procMap["GammaToMuPair"] = ProcessType::GammaToMuPair; /* gamma to mu+mu- */
00022         return procMap;
00023     }
00024 
00025     SimParticle::ProcessTypeMap SimParticle::PROCESS_MAP = SimParticle::createProcessTypeMap();
00026 
00027     SimParticle::SimParticle()
00028         : TObject(), daughters_(new TRefArray()), parents_(new TRefArray()) {
00029     }
00030 
00031     SimParticle::~SimParticle() {
00032         TObject::Clear();
00033         delete daughters_;
00034         delete parents_;
00035     }
00036 
00037     void SimParticle::Clear(Option_t *option) {
00038         TObject::Clear();
00039 
00040         daughters_->Delete();
00041         parents_->Delete();
00042 
00043         energy_ = 0;
00044         pdgID_ = 0;
00045         genStatus_ = -1;
00046         time_ = 0;
00047         x_ = 0;
00048         y_ = 0;
00049         z_ = 0;
00050         endX_ = 0;
00051         endY_ = 0;
00052         endZ_ = 0;
00053         px_ = 0;
00054         py_ = 0;
00055         pz_ = 0;
00056         endpx_ = 0;
00057         endpy_ = 0;
00058         endpz_ = 0;
00059         mass_ = 0;
00060         charge_ = 0;
00061         processType_ = ProcessType::unknown;
00062     }
00063 
00064     void SimParticle::Print(Option_t *option) const {
00065         std::cout << "SimParticle { " <<
00066                 "energy: " << energy_ << ", " <<
00067                 "PDG ID: " << pdgID_ << ", " <<
00068                 "genStatus: " << genStatus_ << ", " <<
00069                 "time: " << time_ << ", " <<
00070                 "vertex: ( " << x_ << ", " << y_ << ", " << z_ << " ), " <<
00071                 "endPoint: ( " << endX_ << ", " << endY_ << ", " << endZ_ << " ), " <<
00072                 "momentum: ( " << px_ << ", " << py_ << ", " << pz_ << " ), " <<
00073                 "endPointMomentum: ( " << endpx_ << ", " << endpy_ << ", " << endpz_ << " ), " <<
00074                 "mass: " << mass_ << ", " <<
00075                 "nDaughters: " << daughters_->GetEntries() << ", "
00076                 "nParents: " << parents_->GetEntries() << ", "
00077                 "processType: " << processType_ <<
00078                 " }" << std::endl;
00079     }

00081     SimParticle::ProcessType SimParticle::findProcessType(std::string processName) {
00082 
00083         if (processName.find("biasWrapper") != std::string::npos) { 
00084             std::size_t pos = processName.find_first_of("(") + 1;
00085             processName = processName.substr(pos, processName.size() - pos - 1); 
00086         }  
00087                 
00088         if (PROCESS_MAP.find(processName) != PROCESS_MAP.end()) {
00089             return PROCESS_MAP[processName];
00090         } else {
00091             return ProcessType::unknown;
00092         }
00093     }
00094
